thread.title: American Airlines To Webcast Presentation At Cowen And Company's 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference
thread.title_full: American Airlines To Webcast Presentation At Cowen And Company's 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: American Airlines To Webcast Presentation At Cowen And Company's 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference
text:
American Airlines Group
FORT WORTH, Texas , Sept. American Airlines Group Inc. (NASDAQ: AAL) Chief Financial Officer Derek Kerr will present at Cowen and Company's 8 th Annual Global Transportation Conference on Wednesday, September 9, at 8 a.m. EDT . A live audio webcast will be available at aa.com/investorrelations .
About American Airlines Group
American Airlines Group (NASDAQ: AAL) is the holding company for American Airlines and US Airways. Together with regional partners, operating as American Eagle and US Airways Express, the airlines operate an average of nearly 6,700 flights per day to nearly 350 destinations in more than 50 countries. American is a founding member of the oneworld alliance, whose members and members-elect serve nearly 1,000 destinations with 14,250 daily flights to 150 countries. This year American topped Fortune Magazine's list of best business turnarounds and its stock was added to the S&P 500 index. Connect with American on Twitter @AmericanAir and at Facebook.com/AmericanAirlines .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20140416/75651
